document.full_text: james neal's goal gave pittsburgh a 3-1 lead in its first-round series with tampa bay. the sabres, meanwhile, evened their series with the flyers at 2-2.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: penguins top lightning in 2 overtimes
lines_and_colors: james neal's goal gave pittsburgh a 3-1 lead in its first-round series with tampa bay. the sabres, meanwhile, evened their series with the flyers at 2-2.
